Reviews.Title: Great low cost security DVR
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at the quality of the DVR. The cameras are cheap, but for the price it is good. Works great with the Mac, iphone nd ipad with the ASee app on the Apple app store...

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 Hardware Compression
Two Type Video Out: TV Monitor BNC Output and PC Monitor VGA Output
Support Remote View via Smart Phone & 3G Mobile
Remote Access: Internet Explorer or Netviewer Software
Notice: the Camera will instead with Color White if the black is out of stock without notice.
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO PKD-DK4216 Complete 4 Channel DVR Kit with 4 Outdoor Waterproof Cameras No Hard Drive
